Title: Dragon Ball: Curse of the Blood Rubies
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Writer: Akira Toriyama (original work), Yoshifumi Yûki (screenplay construction), Toshiki Inoue (screenplay)
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Hiromi Tsuru, Naoki Tatsuta, Naoko Watanabe
Plot: Guko and his friends must stop King Gurumes from destroying the city for blood rubies and gathering the seven Dragon Balls.
